title: Codex CLI 0.92.0 - Dynamic Tools & API v2
description: January 27 release enables API v2 threads to inject dynamic tools at startup with end-to-end routing through server and core tool pipeline. Previous releases: 0.90.0 added network sandbox proxy (Jan 25), 0.89.0 deprecated custom prompts in favor of Skills (Jan 22).

title: Claude Code 2.1 Release
description: Major update introducing Shift+Enter for newlines (highly requested), LSP tool for code intelligence (go-to-definition, find references, hover docs), automatic skill hot-reload, forked sub-agent context, language settings, new Vim motions, IS_DEMO mode, hooks for agents, and VSCode forking/rewind capabilities.

community_feedback.quote: I now start almost all tasks with Claude Code after some initial learning curve
Claude Code CLI was broken - crash issue with Invalid Version: 2.1.0
I'm done with Claude - expressing frustration with the tool
Over 1,096 commits in this update with 5 parallel instances and shared team knowledge

title: January 2026 Update
description: Minor bug fixes and improvements across the platform, with new export functionality. Recent features include multi-branch repository indexing and Devin Review AI-powered code review.

community_feedback.quote: Where did Devin go? Discussing concerns about the tool's visibility in the market

title: Cursor CLI Updates (January 2026)
description: January 16 release adds Agent Modes (Plan and Ask), Cloud Handoff for background tasks, and One-Click MCP Auth. January 8 release introduced new commands for models, rules, and MCP management, with hooks performance improved 10-20x.

community_feedback.quote: Watch out for cursor cli - users reported automatic switching to on-demand mode without notification
This ux is unacceptable - user complained about layout changes and loss of editor mode toggle

title: Copilot CLI Enhanced Agents
description: January 14 update brings enhanced agent capabilities with improved context management and new installation methods. VS Code Copilot update adds parallel subagent execution, new skills system, and deeper Claude integration.

community_feedback.quote: Users praising Copilot's agent UI, with comments about using Sonnet and Opus models in agent mode
Users reporting slow start-stop cycles affecting workflow with Copilot Agent in GitHub webapp

title: Version 0.26.0 - Hooks & Monitoring
description: January 13 release enables hooks by default for workflow customization. January 7 introduced pre-configured Google Cloud Monitoring dashboards with OpenTelemetry support. Version 0.22 made Gemini 3 models available to free users with Conductor and Endor Labs integration.

community_feedback.quote: Gemini 3 Flash in Gemini CLI is better than Claude Code
Users noted being unable to upgrade past version 0.24.5, with newer versions freezing on startup
Gemini CLI is impressive, but Claude Code outperforms on reasoning-heavy tasks

title: Version 1.13.6 - Agent Skills & Security
description: January 12 release adds Agent Skills support for Cascade AI agent system and integrates Code Integrity layer for security. Version 1.13.107 (January 9) enhances Plan Mode and adds Skills support.
